revised_title: Errata: On the Mathematical Theory of Stream-Lines, Especially Those with Four Foci and Upwards
tldr: This article contains corrections to a previous paper on the mathematical theory of streamlines, specifically those with four foci and upwards. It also discusses a method for representing the dimensions and proportions of mammal teeth and the values of integrals related to Laplace's coefficients, with an application to the theory of radiation.
